# removeAllJoints()

**Instance Method**

Removes all joints from the physics world.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeAllJoints()
```

## Joining Physics Bodies with Joints

- **add(_:)**: Adds a joint to the physics world.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes a specific joint from the physics world.
